meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Iceland.
meanings.sent1: In Iceland, you can buy a lot with just a few kronur.
meanings.sent2: She exchanged her dollars for kronur at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The kronur in his pocket jingled as he walked.
meanings.sent4: His savings in kronur were like a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The shiny kronur coins sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: They counted the kronur to make sure they had enough.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper handed over the kronur to the customer.
meanings.sent3: The pile of kronur on the table looked like a small mountain.
meanings.sent4: The kronur scattered on the floor were like confetti.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the kronur falling into the jar was music to his ears.
